items.sentence: My brother is in the same line of business as you are.
I\'m feeling much better than I was feeling yesterday.
Tom heard a noise and went outside to see what it was.
Tom is going to pay me back what he owes me on Monday.
Tom is good at giving easy-to-understand explanations.
I guess I should have known Tom wasn\'t going to help.
I didn\'t know that Tom couldn\'t speak French at all.
There is not much difference between the two opinions.
I\'m almost certain that Tom will go swimming with us.
I\'m going to Boston to visit my family for Christmas.
